Package tourguideservice.service.impl

Class TourGuideServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • tourguideservice.service.impl.TourGuideServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TourGuideService
    @Service
public class TourGuideServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements TourGuideService
    Service implementation class for the main service of TourGuide.
